reviewText: A young man beaten to the brink of death is taken in by shaolin, and taught the art of drunken staff.  After a while the men responsible for the young mans beating try and finish the job.  With the help of ninjas, and a samurai, the Wu Tang emperor tries his best to kill the now monk.  Many fights and styles in this one, with a great staff battle at the end with the young monk and the Wu tang lord.  An older movie, quality is not the best but the film itself makes up for it.
